markdownRemark.html:
Read about my OCD of doing things by the book and how it causes me anxiety and plagues my ability to get anything done.

I’m not sure if there’s a word for this, but I enjoy doing things as real as possbile, maybe better put, done by the book. It’s hard for me to articulate what exactly I mean by that, so for the purpose of this post, I’ll explain one simple and contrived example that I’ve come across recently.

Think of a website, any website. I just thought of Twitter. Now, visit the site in mind locate the footer of the site. There you will most likely see multiple links, probably some about the product, the company, the legal things, etc. I’d bet there is also a statement that looks somewhere along the lines of:

© <year> <company_name>

frontmatter.title: My Process of Building Side Projects
